resolution: Test with another power socket and verify PSU switch is on.
Reset network adapter and update Wi-Fi drivers.
Run a speed test and reboot both router and modem.
Remove the email account and add it again with updated settings.
Clear the print queue and reinstall the print service.
Run Windows Memory Diagnostic and check recent driver changes.
Clear application temp files and reset app configuration.
Use self‑service password portal or admin-assisted reset.
Update default program associations for the file type.
Reconnect network profile and check domain login status.
Disable USB selective suspend in power settings.
Restart Windows Audio service and reinstall sound drivers.
Reconnect cables and test with another monitor port.
Clean keyboard and reinstall keyboard drivers.
Disable pointer precision and check for surface issues.
Run installer as administrator and ensure disk has enough space.
Disable IPv6 and adjust DNS settings to 8.8.8.8.
Reset network settings on both host and connected device.
Recover files using previous version restore.
Disable hardware acceleration and reset browser settings.
Use built‑in print-to-PDF or a dedicated converter tool.

issue: PC startup feels slower than usual
resolution: Check startup apps and run disk cleanup.
Re‑activate using updated license file or server sync.
Enable camera from device security settings.

issue: Bluetooth device connects but no audio
resolution: Set the device as default communication output.
Revalidate SMTP authentication and clear outbox.
Uninstall suspicious apps and reset DNS to default.
Run storage analyzer and remove large unused files.

issue: Windows update stuck at certain percentage
resolution: Run Windows Update Troubleshooter and clear update cache.
Merge file versions manually and force sync refresh.
Increase virtual memory and close unused apps.
Request updated VPN profile from IT admin.
Switch to authenticator app instead of SMS.
Check application service status and restart backend processes.
Increase connection timeout and test DB health.

issue: Users getting logged out too quickly
resolution: Update session policy in identity provider.
Scan for malware and update background services.
Disable SMB signing temporarily for performance testing.
Ensure correct role assignment and refresh token.
Disable adaptive brightness and update GPU drivers.
Use file recovery software and restore previous version.
Reinstall display adapter from Device Manager.
Delete cache directories and reinstall client app.
Assign static IP to printer and reconnect.

issue: Network path not reconnecting on login
resolution: Add batch script to map drives automatically.
Reduce file size or upload through OneDrive/SharePoint.
Force Outlook profile repair.
Reset security tokens and verify MFA setup.

issue: Laptop battery drains faster than usual
resolution: Run battery calibration and disable background syncing.
Sync with corporate NTP server and disable manual edits.
